title: Comparing covalently-linked BODIPY-Pyrene system versus the correspondent physical mixture as chromophores in Luminescent Solar Concentrators
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Accepted Manuscript

Massimiliano Cordaro, GIULIA NERI, Anna Piperno, Ambra Maria Cancelliere, Antonio Santoro, Scolastica Serroni, Francesco Nastasi, Antonino Arrigo
Luminescent solar concentrators (LSC) appear as an attractive solution to extend the application of photovoltaic panels by installing them “invisibly” in urban architectures. Many researchers are working on boosting the...
